ProjectTitle: Valorization of airborne ammonia emissions of livestock farming by plasma-enabled conversion to ammonium nitrate fertilizer
InitialFeedbackHistory:
26/07/2022
Please note that the DMP that FWO asks you to write in the first 6 months of your project is considered the initial DMP, I therefore moved it from intermediate to initial. 
4. Metadata: are you generating any metadata in your experiments? 
7. Sharing: have you considered using a repository for data sharing? If there is no suitable disciplinary repository you can use the KU Leuven data repository RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr, for code you can use KU Leuven gitlab (https://gitlab.kuleuven.be/).
label: good with suggestions
